parameter.value: I can offer you meat, ham, apples, carrots, cookies, brown breads, breads and eggs.
How do you like my little restaurant? Isn't it cute?
Yeh sure, long live the king... bla bla.
This is Adanac. You are very, very attentive.
Natalon has commited some heroic deeds.
Ann is nice. She is eating here from time to time.
He once told me he thinks my inn is of pathetic quality. Still, he eats here often.
Johanne eats her often. And she eats much. I'm curious how she can retain her deft figure.
He loves my food. He also provides me with fish... some times.
Agorn has never been here, I think...
Bah. His magical powers once, 'by mistake', ruined my whole inn.
Welcome |PLAYERNAME|, what brings you to my tavern?
